title: Secrets of interpretation of being beaten with a stick in a dream, for good and evil

preview.html: Today, in this article, we will learn about the interpretation of beating with a stick in a dream. Beating is one of the painful things that no one likes, because of the humiliation and humiliation that results from it, and the psychological and physical pain that beating causes. He is in pain and wants to know the meaning or message that this dream carries, but he cannot know whether it brings good or evil. Through the following article on the encyclopedia website, we present to you the interpretation of a dream about multiplying good and evil. Bad, so follow us. Interpretation of beating with a stick in a dream: If a man sees in a dream that he is hitting his wife hard with a stick and his wife is in pain, then this dream symbolizes that the dreamer is about to enter into a business, and he will risk all the money he has and he is very afraid of losing this money. But you shouldn't. God Almighty guides him, guides him, and helps him, and he benefits from his trade, but he must obtain the reasons for success, and learn and develop his skills in this matter. If a person sees that someone hit him with a stick, then this dream is one of the unwanted dreams, as it indicates that the man will face problems and disputes will arise. Between him and his family, it also indicates that he will face some obstacles in his work that prevent him from progressing in it. The symbol of being beaten with a stick in a dream: One of the warning visions for a married man is that he sees in his dream that he is walking somewhere and around him there are many people arguing with sticks, and this dream means that There are people in his life who feel hostile feelings towards him, and want to harm him through his work or his family, and whoever sees this vision should beware of the people he deals with and do not completely trust in any way and ask God for help and pray to expose the plots of the conspirators. If A person saw in a dream that he was beating a small child, and the child was suffering from severe pain from this beating. This dream is a warning to the dreamer that he is committing a sin, and that he must stop those actions and repent to God Almighty and ask Him to forgive him for what he did. Beating with a stick in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees in her dream that someone is hitting her with a stick and feels pain from that blow. He left marks on her body. He should worry because it will be a small problem and he can overcome it. But if she sees that she is the one hitting the other person and hits him with a stick, this dream means that this girl will invest her own money in a project, but she has no experience in this type of work, which exposes her to problems because it is not With a good job. But God Almighty saves her from it. An unmarried girl seeing someone hitting another person in a dream means that there will be heated disputes between members of the girl’s family or one of her acquaintances, and the girl will intervene to solve this problem, and may God grant her success. Ready. Beating with a stick in a married woman’s dream. A married woman sees in her dream that she is beating one of her children with a stick. This dream symbolizes the feelings that this woman feels that she wants to raise her son and raise him well. It also shows that this child is doing something wrong and the mother wants to prevent him from doing that. . Only God knows. One of the most painful ones

title: Interpretation of a dream about guava in detail

preview.html: Giving guava in a dream Guava indicates estrangement between families. Guava indicates that you must get close to your family if there is estrangement between you, especially since it contains thorns, because thorns have all negative interpretations and the cause of estrangement could be women. Seeing guava in a dream indicates ease Life, and the ease of eating guava indicates the ease of survival, and the difficulty of eating guava due to the presence of hard seeds in it indicates the difficulty of earning a living, but the fortuneteller who will find it after that. A little patience and wisdom, and guava can indicate drought or dehydration. As part of its name. Interpretation of seeing guava in a dream: Seeing guava in a dream can indicate a good person and the smell is associated with the smell of guava. Guava can indicate a lack of interest and interest. Seeing green guava in a dream means solving old problems and conflicts in life and alleviating worries. Guava in a dream shows the dreamer’s success In his life and the kindness he receives. Yellow guava indicates worries, debts, and problems that may bother the fortuneteller. Eating white guava in a dream indicates a change in circumstances for the better, comfort, calm, and the removal of problems. Eating spoiled guava in a dream indicates that the dreamer talks and chats a lot and betrays some of those close to him in his life. It indicates A guava tree in a dream indicates progress in life, success, and an abundance of goodness that the dreamer will obtain. If one sees himself picking guava fruit from the tree, this is evidence of a calm and happy life. Eating and eating fresh guava in a dream indicates that anxiety and relief will disappear after distress. Seeing a guava tree with many fruits Guava denotes sustenance with a large number of children and good offspring or money and a lot of sustenance from where it does not matter. Seeing a green guava in a dream can be a sign that a person has good morals and is wise and makes the right decisions in difficult times. Whoever sees that another person He gives him green guava fruit, as this indicates that he and this person will have a good relationship, strong friendship, trust, and mutual benefit. As for yellow guava, it can indicate a serious illness or following a forbidden diet. Guava in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates ease and conduct of childbirth and success in pregnancy, and that the newborn It will be healthy if the guava is white and has a good smell and taste, and it also indicates its safety. If you see yourself buying guava in a dream, this indicates immediate comfort, removing fears, changing circumstances for the good and accelerating good things for the pioneer, and guava can be in the dream A sign of haste in making decisions. He saw in a dream that he is drinking guava juice, it is a sign of good behavior, ease of things, almost comfort, justice, leaving tension and distress, and obtaining easy sustenance. Seeing colored guava in a dream means kindness, nourishment, and conflict resolution. It indicates Ripe guava in a dream indicates a lot of good and surprising food and brotherhood

title: Interpretation of seeing money in a dream by senior scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing money in a dream: It is one of the dreams that many people wonder about for fear of bringing a bad sign, because money is one of the important things in life and even a necessity. For this reason, there are a large number of dream interpreters who interpreted this dream according to its facts, and in the following lines we will explain the most important things that were said about it. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he obtains money, this is evidence of the dreamer’s desire to achieve certain goals, and he can do them, and help him In this matter, and God knows best. The vision of receiving money in a dream is evidence that the dreamer enjoys his life and the work that he does, and God increases his livelihood greatly because of his diligence, and God knows best. The dreamer’s vision of receiving money is evidence of the abundance of his livelihood in the coming days, so that he can To get out of the financial crisis he was going through and so that he could manage his life well after that. That his conditions will improve, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Obtaining money in a dream is a sign of the abundance of goodness and many financial gains that the dreamer will receive soon, and God knows best. If the money that the dreamer obtains is a lot, this means that joy and happiness will come to him quickly after a while. A long period of distress, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets this dream and says that receiving money in a dream from a close person is evidence of the extent of love and friendship between the dreamer and this person. The dream may mean that the dreamer hears thanks and praise from the person who gave him money in The dream, but in reality God knows best. If one sees in a dream that someone gives him money, but it is wrapped, this means that God will give a lot of money soon, and God knows best. A dreamer who takes money from a stranger is evidence that the dreamer is a hypocrite and is deceiving some People, but if he takes a banknote from a person in a dream, this indicates that his wife will become pregnant if she gets married. And God knows best. If someone sees in a dream that there is another person carrying a lot of money and is proud of it, it is evidence that you are earning a lot of money illegally, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees that there is someone giving him money and he does not need it, this means that the dreamer will face... Many problems, and the dream may indicate that the dreamer does not pay zakat and alms, and God knows best. Taking money from a stranger in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is hiding bad things from others, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a single woman in a dream is that she is taking money. From someone is evidence that you are starting a new life full of hope and positive energy, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that someone is giving her money, this means that she will overcome the obstacles that stood in the way of her goals, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about receiving money from someone Acquaintances to one person: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream, someone she knows giving her money, is evidence of the existence of a strong relationship between them, and this relationship is governed by mutual trust, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. This dream is evidence of the bright future of the unmarried girl.

title: What do you know about the interpretation of a dream about a black snake chasing me?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a black snake chasing me: Black snakes cause anxiety in dreams, and their mere appearance in a dream turns them into a nightmare, but dreams with negative interpretations are considered a gift because they illuminate the dreamer’s vision and provide useful advice and warnings. Contrary to your belief, you should be optimistic about seeing a black snake, because this dream can lead us to salvation from the current problem. What is the interpretation of a dream about a black snake chasing me? A black snake in a dream shows enemies, and if someone dreams that he is chasing her, then this dream indicates that there are The dreamer has many enemies, including a person close to the dreamer, but he has bad intentions in his heart, and is planning to harm him, so he must pay attention and turn to God and ask Him to protect him from the machinations of his enemies. But if this black snake bites the dreamer while chasing him, the dream may indicate To misfortunes that the dreamer will fall into and cause him the harm he fears, and this may be a warning to pay attention to his next steps and avoid evil in equal measure. As much as possible. Seeing black snakes occupying the house and frightening its people is evidence that the enemies of God, the infidels in religion, have entered this house. Image of relatives or friends. If you dream that a snake is chasing you and attacking you, one of your close friends may be cunning and two-faced and wants to see you suffer and is planning this at the same time that he seems to care about you and wish you well. Well, if you kill the snake in the dream, this is the best evidence that you will emerge from the pit that wants to drown you and that God will protect you from its cunning and malicious plans. Whoever dreams of a black snake attacking him in his bedroom and on his bed and he was unable to escape from it, then the dream portends bad luck and trouble, but if He was able to get her out of the room, as this is good news that God will solve it. All his troubles are for him and bring him peace of mind and compensate him for everything he went through and reward him for his patience with what his eyes perceive. Running away from snakes and trying to get rid of them can indicate a person’s desire to escape from the difficult problems facing him, and in the event that he is able to get rid of them or even avoid harming them This may indicate the dreamer's strength. . His character and his ability to emerge from crises, and that he will be in a better position than he was before the crisis occurred. Interpretation of the dream of the black snake that is chasing me by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explains the little black snake as a son who is strict with his parents, and has bad morals and treatment, and he is a good son to his parents. It can be seen as The dream is as advice to the father or mother not to be more patient than this with the son’s mistakes and to start correcting him gently and not writing him down with God as a sin. Seeing black snakes trying to attack the dreamer in his home and harm him is an unpleasant vision in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, especially if they manage Snakes prevent reaching the dreamer and touching his body, because they are evidence of competition between him and someone. One of his family members, the dispute may be between him and his wife or between his children or siblings. He must find solutions to the conflict and end this conflict. The soul does not ignore the separation of loved ones, and these disturbing dreams can bring

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone looking at you in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a dream about someone you love, Ibn Sirin says that if a person dreams that he is talking to his beloved, this may be one of some of the worries and problems that this person may suffer from in his future periods. Seeing someone you love while you are far away. Dreaming with someone you love while she is far away from you indicates problems in her life in general. Or She is facing disagreements with her lover in particular. Talking to someone she loves while she is away from the complex denotes getting rid of sadness, anxiety and problems and restoring her happy life with her fiancé. Seeing someone she loves while traveling in reality shows an abundance of wealth and a feeling of optimism. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a lover at home. Seeing the girl you love in The house indicates that she thinks a lot about this person and is constantly busy thinking about her husband. See the point. Someone she loves. title: Interpretation of a dream about raw chicken for a divorced woman

preview.html: Chicken is one of the basic foods that many love and prefer and can be prepared in hundreds of ways. But what about seeing raw chicken in a dream? This is what we will answer today in detail for men and women in the following lines. Interpretation of seeing a raw chicken in a dream for a single girl: A single girl dreams of trying to cut raw chicken in a dream. The dream indicates that the dreamer is suffering from recurring crises in all stages of her life, including study, marriage, and work, and God knows best. The girl who sees herself throwing raw chicken in the trash in a dream. The dream shows that the dreamer is looking for all the problems and trying to solve them. Which confronts her and prevents her from enjoying her life radically, and God knows best. And if you see a single girl cooking raw chicken in a dream. The vision means The dreamer will enter into an emotional experience and fail, which will make her sad and rush to choose a husband, which will also lead to the failure of the marriage, and God knows best. As for seeing chickens slaughtered in a dream for an unmarried girl, it is a sign of hearing good news. It makes the dreamer’s life completely turn for the better, and God knows best. Seeing A single girl slaughtering and cleaning chicken in a dream is a sign that she will travel abroad and start a new life, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a white chicken. Interpretation of seeing raw chicken in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees a raw chicken in a dream in general. It is a metaphor for the dreamer’s feeling of happiness in her life in general. And she enjoys her stable marital life with her husband, and God knows best. And if a married woman sees that she is eating raw chicken meat in a dream. The dream symbolizes that she is suffering from disagreements with her husband due to the difference in customs and traditions between her family and his family. And that her husband is trying to change her habits, and God knows best. And a married woman. When she dreams that she is cutting raw chicken to cook food in a dream. The vision shows that the dreamer is waiting for something important to happen in her life. Perhaps she is pregnant and prays to God with her all the time, and God knows best. Seeing washing and cleaning raw chicken in a dream for an unmarried girl. A metaphor for dealing with her problems and worries. All the time. Which makes her feel tired and exhausted most of the time, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing raw chicken in a dream for a man and its meaning. A man sees himself cutting raw chicken in a dream. The vision means that he is a calm person who manages his life calmly and is in control. He does not give anyone the opportunity to interfere in his private life. A man or a family member suffers from illness and fatigue and sees a raw chicken in a dream. It is considered a good vision for speedy recovery and getting rid of fatigue from God Almighty. The vision also means that the dreamer will enjoy health and longevity during his life, and God knows best. Whether he is married when he dreams that he is eating chicken. Raw in a dream and the taste was very bitter. The dream indicates that the dreamer is entering into suspicious relationships with women who are not suitable for him. He must reconsider himself because this path will cause him to lose his life, and God knows best. Seeing raw chicken meat in a dream and it was black in a dream is for a married man. It indicates that the man is incurring a huge financial loss in his work because of his corruption

title: Interpretation of prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin: I dreamed that I was praying

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of praying in the Al-Mazraa Mosque in the Kaaba facing other than the qiblah, interrupting prayer for the single, for the married, for the pregnant woman, for the divorced, for Al-Nabulsi, for Ibn Shirin and others. It indicates the completion of an order and the attainment of a message. Paying a debt, fulfilling a trust, or creating an obligation are duties of God Almighty. We said that its owner prepares for Hajj and avoids immorality, as God Almighty says: “Prayer forbids immorality and injustice.” The Sunnah indicates the purity of its owner, his patience with hardship, and the appearance of a good reputation. For him, according to the Almighty’s saying: And whoever has it in his hand and does good to them beyond what is necessary, and is obligated to eat and dress, and works diligently in the affairs of his friends, this will inherit honor and voluntary work for him. It requires the perfection of chivalry and the removal of worries. On a cloudy day in which the clouds have moved, and if he sees that he is praying the afternoon prayer, this indicates that the work he has is the least left. Interpretation of praying for people in a dream. Jurists say in the interpretation of dreams that seeing a person praying with people in a dream means that he will assume responsibility for people and become worthy of this position. And they make many people sick. If he sees in a dream that he is praying with men and women together, this means that he will obtain justice among the people if he is ready for that, or that this person will mediate a great peace between the people. If one sees in his dream that he is praying with women, This means that this person assumes the authority of a weak person. If a woman sees in her dream that she is praying with men, this indicates her death, because women only precede men in death. Interpretation of praying in the mosque in a dream Dream interpretation jurists say that seeing prayer on the roof indicates That this person improves in the ranks, has a good reputation, and performs alms and duties. But if one sees in a dream that he is performing the prayer sitting without an excuse, this means that this person is doing something but his work is not accepted. Interpretation of church prayer in a dreamIf one sees in a dream that the ruler He prays with the people, it means that this ruler will be removed and his money will be gone, and if one sees in his dream that he is praying with the people and does not know how to read and write. This indicates that this person wants something and cannot get it. Interpretation of praying without bowing in a dream. If he sees that she is standing in prayer, and does not kneel until the time comes, then he is withholding the obligatory zakat, so he does not pay it. Interpretation of praying on the Kaaba in a dream. Interpretation jurists say Dreams that praying on the Kaaba portend a lot of goodness for a person, such as if a person sees in a dream that he is praying the afternoon prayer on the Kaaba, this indicates that that person will approach the ruler and approach him. Obtaining a lot of goodness. If one sees in a dream that he is making a pilgrimage to the Holy Kaaba in a dream and arriving at the shrine, this means that this person will gain a lot of goodness in his religion and worldly affairs, and will achieve a very high status in his family. But if one sees in a dream that If he prays above the Kaaba, this means that this person suffers from a flaw
